title: WALKING THROUGH THE STORM
description: Embracing the unconventional, it would appear that Marina-Lynne has discovered the elusive secret to living happily ever after. Protected from her past and loved like never before, she and her son's lives have taken a turn for the better and Marina-Lynne has much to look forward to.Unfortunately, all good things must come to an end and with only days to spare, the small family must rely on themselves and their allies if they hope to survive. Not everyone can be trusted, however. Marina-Lynne discovers the hard way that her future is firmly attached to her past and she must solve a mystery if she has any hope of setting her and her new friend, Sarah, free.Determined to keep his family safe, Kavan makes a decision that will change their lives forever - one he just might regret. Secrets are revealed when danger strikes too close for comfort.
author: Angeline Gallant
